creator: Easy Keyboard
descriptionHtml:
★ Punjabi Voice Typing Keyboard – Punjabi Keyboard ★

Quick Punjabi voice Typing Keyboard designed to empower your ideas for easy typing

Punjabi Voice Typing Keyboard is an English to Punjabi keyboard app that makes typing Punjabi faster than ever before. Punjabi
Keyboard is a simply keyboard that have English letter keyboard layout with different Punjabi typing keyboard themes.

By using Punjabi Voice Typing keyboard - punjabi keyboard app just you speak in punjabi and get your punjabi text automatically typed and also just you type! A very simple & easy app but very useful. This app will capture your voice and convert it to punjabi text.

Punjabi keyboard is a Punjabi input method design to type Punjabi which helps in typing Punjabi language. Punjabi keyboard is a combination of keyboard themes with emoji that provide variety of Punjabi typing keyboard themes in different colours with Punjabi input method which allows user to Learn Punjabi.

You now don't need Punjabi keyboards to type in punjabi. Just use this application, speak in punjabi and get your punjabi text automatically typed. A very easy and simple application but very useful. The app will capture your voice and convert it to punjabi Text.

This Punjabi Voice Typing Keyboard application will allow you to typing without getting bored. This application has all best tools to change your simple keyboard into amazing voice type keyboard.

Easy Punjabi typing keyboard is for Punjabi lovers who want to use “Punjabi input” through default English keyboard. Now you can chat on social media, you just write in Roman English and easy punjabi keyboard and English to Punjabi keyboard change it in Punjabi input.

★ Easy to use and setup

1. Open Punjabi Voice Typing Keyboard application.
2. Select "Enable" Button to Enable Punjabi Keyboard.
3. Select "Switch" Button to Switch Punjabi Keyboard.

❤ Punjabi Voice Typing Keyboard – Punjabi Keyboard ❤

★ Easily type punjabi from English.
★ 50+ Colourful themes.
★ Provide 1500+ cool emojis.
★ This is the easiest app for English to Punjabi typing
★ A phonetic Punjabi transliteration keyboard that works on Android phones and tablets.
★ No need to learn Punjabi keypad and layout.
★ The best rated Punjabi typing app that works as Punjabi English keyboard
★ This English to Punjabi keyboard is easier to use than any other keyboard
★ Lots of sticker and GIFs and you can also download from online.
★ Use default keyboard and type in Punjabi
★ Convert English into Punjabi
★ Convert roman (native language) punjabi English into Punjabi
★ Correct words suggestion
★ Friendly interface with different themes which you like
★ Type punjabi from English keyboard. type word and press on space to convert into punjabi language.

★ Privacy and Security
- We will never collect your personal info. We only use the words typed by you to make the predictions more accurate.

If you enjoy the app, please share it with your friends and leave a review. We appreciate your feedback.

Thanks for download.....! Enjoyed.
